| `Line 781: भारतस्येतिहासस्य श्रूयतां पर्वसङ्ग्रहः ||३३||` | "Listen to the summary of sections of the historical narrative [itihāsa] of Bharata. ||33||" |
| `Line 782: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 783: पर्वानुक्रमणी पूर्वं द्वितीयं पर्वसङ्ग्रहः |` | "First is the table of contents [Parvānukramaṇī], second is the summary of sections [Parvasaṅgraha]," |
| `Line 784: पौष्यं पौलोममास्तीकमादिवंशावतारणम् ||३४||` | "The Paushya, Pauloma, Āstīka, and the Descent of the First Dynasty [Ādivaṃśāvataraṇa]. ||34||" |
| `Line 785: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 786: ततः सम्भवपर्वोक्तमद्भुतं देवनिर्मितम् |` | "Then comes the marvelous divine-created section called Sambhava [Origin]," |
| `Line 787: दाहो जतुगृहस्यात्र हैडिम्बं पर्व चोच्यते ||३५||` | "The burning of the lac house is here, and the section called Hiḍimba is mentioned. ||35||" |
| `Line 788: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 789: ततो बकवधः पर्व पर्व चैत्ररथं ततः |` | "Then comes the section on the slaying of Baka, and then the Chaitraratha section," |
| `Line 790: ततः स्वयंवरं देव्याः पाञ्चाल्याः पर्व चोच्यते ||३६||` | "Then is mentioned the section on the self-choice [svayaṃvara] of the Panchala princess [Draupadi]. ||36||" |
| `Line 791: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 792: क्षत्रधर्मेण निर्जित्य ततो वैवाहिकं स्मृतम् |` | "Having conquered according to Kshatriya duty, then comes the section on marriage [Vaivāhika]," |
| `Line 793: विदुरागमनं पर्व राज्यलम्भस्तथैव च ||३७||` | "The section on Vidura's arrival, and likewise the obtaining of the kingdom. ||37||" |
| `Line 794: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 795: अर्जुनस्य वने वासः सुभद्राहरणं ततः |` | "Arjuna's dwelling in the forest, then the abduction of Subhadra," |
| `Line 796: सुभद्राहरणादूर्ध्वं ज्ञेयं हरणहारिकम् ||३८||` | "After the abduction of Subhadra, know the section called Haraṇahārika [Gifts after abduction]. ||38||" |
| `Line 797: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 798: ततः खाण्डवदाहाख्यं तत्रैव मयदर्शनम् |` | "Then the section called the burning of Khandava forest, and therein the appearance of Maya [architect]," |
| `Line 799: सभापर्व ततः प्रोक्तं मन्त्रपर्व ततः परम् ||३९||` | "Then is declared the Assembly Hall section [Sabhāparva], and after that the Council section [Mantraparva]. ||39||" |
| `Line 800: ` | [Blank line] |

completed_batches.content:
| **Sanskrit** | **English Translation** |
|-------------|-------------------------|
| `Line 801: जरासन्धवधः पर्व पर्व दिग्विजयस्तथा |` | "The chapter of Jarāsandha's slaying, and likewise the chapter of world conquest [digvijaya]," |
| `Line 802: पर्व दिग्विजयादूर्ध्वं राजसूयिकमुच्यते ||४०||` | "After the chapter of world conquest, the chapter concerning the Rājasūya [royal consecration] is described. ||40||" |
| `Line 803: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 804: ततश्चार्घाभिहरणं शिशुपालवधस्ततः |` | "Then the offering of honors [arghya], and after that the slaying of Śiśupāla," |
| `Line 805: द्यूतपर्व ततः प्रोक्तमनुद्यूतमतः परम् ||४१||` | "Then is described the Gambling chapter, and after that the Consequent Gambling chapter. ||41||" |
| `Line 806: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 807: तत आरण्यकं पर्व किर्मीरवध एव च |` | "Then the Forest chapter, and also the slaying of Kirmīra," |
| `Line 808: ईश्वरार्जुनयोर्युद्धं पर्व कैरातसञ्ज्ञितम् ||४२||` | "The battle between Īśvara [Śiva] and Arjuna, the chapter known as Kirāta [hunter form of Śiva]. ||42||" |
| `Line 809: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 810: इन्द्रलोकाभिगमनं पर्व ज्ञेयमतः परम् |` | "After that should be known the chapter of the journey to Indra's world [heaven]," |
| `Line 811: तीर्थयात्रा ततः पर्व कुरुराजस्य धीमतः ||४३||` | "Then the chapter of the pilgrimage of the wise Kuru king [Yudhiṣṭhira]. ||43||" |
| `Line 812: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 813: जटासुरवधः पर्व यक्षयुद्धमतः परम् |` | "The chapter of Jaṭāsura's slaying, and after that the battle with the Yakṣa [supernatural being]," |
| `Line 814: तथैवाजगरं पर्व विज्ञेयं तदनन्तरम् ||४४||` | "And likewise the Ajagara [python] chapter should be known thereafter. ||44||" |
| `Line 815: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 816: मार्कण्डेयसमस्या च पर्वोक्तं तदनन्तरम् |` | "And the chapter of Mārkaṇḍeya's discourse is described thereafter," |
| `Line 817: संवादश्च ततः पर्व द्रौपदीसत्यभामयोः ||४५||` | "And then the chapter of the conversation between Draupadī and Satyabhāmā. ||45||" |
| `Line 818: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 819: घोषयात्रा ततः पर्व मृगस्वप्नभयं ततः |` | "Then the chapter of the journey to Ghoṣa, then the fear from the deer dream," |
| `Line 820: व्रीहिद्रौणिकमाख्यानं ततोऽनन्तरमुच्यते ||४६||` | "The story of the measure of rice [vrīhidroṇika] is described immediately after that. ||46||" |
| `Line 821: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 822: द्रौपदीहरणं पर्व सैन्धवेन वनात्ततः |` | "The chapter of Draupadī's abduction from the forest by Saindhava [Jayadratha]," |
| `Line 823: कुण्डलाहरणं पर्व ततः परमिहोच्यते ||४७||` | "The chapter of the taking of the earrings is described here after that. ||47||" |
| `Line 824: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 825: आरणेयं ततः पर्व वैराटं तदनन्तरम् |` | "Then the Āraṇeya chapter, and after that the Virāṭa chapter," |
translations: | `Line 801: जरासन्धवधः पर्व पर्व दिग्विजयस्तथा |` | "The chapter of Jarāsandha's slaying, and likewise the chapter of world conquest [digvijaya]," |
| `Line 802: पर्व दिग्विजयादूर्ध्वं राजसूयिकमुच्यते ||४०||` | "After the chapter of world conquest, the chapter concerning the Rājasūya [royal consecration] is described. ||40||" |
| `Line 803: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 804: ततश्चार्घाभिहरणं शिशुपालवधस्ततः |` | "Then the offering of honors [arghya], and after that the slaying of Śiśupāla," |
| `Line 805: द्यूतपर्व ततः प्रोक्तमनुद्यूतमतः परम् ||४१||` | "Then is described the Gambling chapter, and after that the Consequent Gambling chapter. ||41||" |
| `Line 806: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 807: तत आरण्यकं पर्व किर्मीरवध एव च |` | "Then the Forest chapter, and also the slaying of Kirmīra," |
| `Line 808: ईश्वरार्जुनयोर्युद्धं पर्व कैरातसञ्ज्ञितम् ||४२||` | "The battle between Īśvara [Śiva] and Arjuna, the chapter known as Kirāta [hunter form of Śiva]. ||42||" |
| `Line 809: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 810: इन्द्रलोकाभिगमनं पर्व ज्ञेयमतः परम् |` | "After that should be known the chapter of the journey to Indra's world [heaven]," |
| `Line 811: तीर्थयात्रा ततः पर्व कुरुराजस्य धीमतः ||४३||` | "Then the chapter of the pilgrimage of the wise Kuru king [Yudhiṣṭhira]. ||43||" |
| `Line 812: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 813: जटासुरवधः पर्व यक्षयुद्धमतः परम् |` | "The chapter of Jaṭāsura's slaying, and after that the battle with the Yakṣa [supernatural being]," |
| `Line 814: तथैवाजगरं पर्व विज्ञेयं तदनन्तरम् ||४४||` | "And likewise the Ajagara [python] chapter should be known thereafter. ||44||" |
| `Line 815: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 816: मार्कण्डेयसमस्या च पर्वोक्तं तदनन्तरम् |` | "And the chapter of Mārkaṇḍeya's discourse is described thereafter," |
| `Line 817: संवादश्च ततः पर्व द्रौपदीसत्यभामयोः ||४५||` | "And then the chapter of the conversation between Draupadī and Satyabhāmā. ||45||" |
| `Line 818: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 819: घोषयात्रा ततः पर्व मृगस्वप्नभयं ततः |` | "Then the chapter of the journey to Ghoṣa, then the fear from the deer dream," |
| `Line 820: व्रीहिद्रौणिकमाख्यानं ततोऽनन्तरमुच्यते ||४६||` | "The story of the measure of rice [vrīhidroṇika] is described immediately after that. ||46||" |
| `Line 821: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 822: द्रौपदीहरणं पर्व सैन्धवेन वनात्ततः |` | "The chapter of Draupadī's abduction from the forest by Saindhava [Jayadratha]," |
| `Line 823: कुण्डलाहरणं पर्व ततः परमिहोच्यते ||४७||` | "The chapter of the taking of the earrings is described here after that. ||47||" |
| `Line 824: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 825: आरणेयं ततः पर्व वैराटं तदनन्तरम् |` | "Then the Āraṇeya chapter, and after that the Virāṭa chapter," |

completed_batches.content:
| **Sanskrit** | **English Translation** |
|-------------|-------------------------|
| `Line 826: कीचकानां वधः पर्व पर्व गोग्रहणं ततः ||४८||` | "The section on the slaying of the Kīcakas [Matsya generals], and then the section on the cattle-raid [Go-grahaṇa]. ||48||" |
| `Line 827: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 828: अभिमन्युना च वैराट्याः पर्व वैवाहिकं स्मृतम् |` | "The section on the marriage of Abhimanyu with the princess of Virāṭa [Uttarā] is remembered as the wedding section." |
| `Line 829: उद्योगपर्व विज्ञेयमत ऊर्ध्वं महाद्भुतम् ||४९||` | "After this, the highly wonderful Udyoga Parva [Effort section] should be known. ||49||" |
| `Line 830: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 831: ततः सञ्जययानाख्यं पर्व ज्ञेयमतः परम् |` | "Then after this, the section known as Sañjaya-yāna [Sanjaya's journey] should be known." |
| `Line 832: प्रजागरं ततः पर्व धृतराष्ट्रस्य चिन्तया ||५०||` | "Then the section called Prajāgara [Sleepless night], with Dhritarashtra's anxieties. ||50||" |
| `Line 833: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 834: पर्व सानत्सुजातं च गुह्यमध्यात्मदर्शनम् |` | "And the Sanat-sujāta section, containing secret spiritual knowledge [metaphysical teachings]." |
| `Line 835: यानसन्धिस्ततः पर्व भगवद्यानमेव च ||५१||` | "Then the section on Yāna-sandhi [Preparation for march], and also the section on Bhagavad-yāna [Lord's journey]. ||51||" |
| `Line 836: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 837: ज्ञेयं विवादपर्वात्र कर्णस्यापि महात्मनः |` | "Here should be known the section on the dispute of the noble-souled Karṇa." |
| `Line 838: निर्याणं पर्व च ततः कुरुपाण्डवसेनयोः ||५२||` | "And then the section on the marching forth of the armies of the Kurus and Pāṇḍavas. ||52||" |
| `Line 839: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 840: रथातिरथसङ्ख्या च पर्वोक्तं तदनन्तरम् |` | "And after that is described the section on the enumeration of charioteers and great charioteers [military rankings]." |
| `Line 841: उलूकदूतागमनं पर्वामर्षविवर्धनम् ||५३||` | "The section on the arrival of Ulūka as messenger, which increases anger [provocation]. ||53||" |
| `Line 842: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 843: अम्बोपाख्यानमपि च पर्व ज्ञेयमतः परम् |` | "And after this should be known the section containing the story of Ambā [Bhishma's nemesis]." |
| `Line 844: भीष्माभिषेचनं पर्व ज्ञेयमद्भुतकारणम् ||५४||` | "The section on the installation of Bhīṣma [as commander], which should be known as causing wonder. ||54||" |
| `Line 845: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 846: जम्बूखण्डविनिर्माणं पर्वोक्तं तदनन्तरम् |` | "After that is described the section on the formation of Jambū-khaṇḍa [geography of India]." |
| `Line 847: भूमिपर्व ततो ज्ञेयं द्वीपविस्तरकीर्तनम् ||५५||` | "Then should be known the Bhūmi Parva [Earth section], describing the extent of the continents [world geography]. ||55||" |
| `Line 848: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 849: पर्वोक्तं भगवद्गीता पर्व भीष्मवधस्ततः |` | "Then is described the section on the Bhagavad Gītā [divine song], and after that the section on the slaying of Bhīṣma." |
| `Line 850: द्रोणाभिषेकः पर्वोक्तं संशप्तकवधस्ततः ||५६||` | "The section on the installation of Droṇa [as commander] is described, and then the slaying of the Saṃśaptakas [oath-bound warriors]. ||56||" |
translations: | `Line 826: कीचकानां वधः पर्व पर्व गोग्रहणं ततः ||४८||` | "The section on the slaying of the Kīcakas [Matsya generals], and then the section on the cattle-raid [Go-grahaṇa]. ||48||" |
| `Line 827: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 828: अभिमन्युना च वैराट्याः पर्व वैवाहिकं स्मृतम् |` | "The section on the marriage of Abhimanyu with the princess of Virāṭa [Uttarā] is remembered as the wedding section." |
| `Line 829: उद्योगपर्व विज्ञेयमत ऊर्ध्वं महाद्भुतम् ||४९||` | "After this, the highly wonderful Udyoga Parva [Effort section] should be known. ||49||" |
| `Line 830: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 831: ततः सञ्जययानाख्यं पर्व ज्ञेयमतः परम् |` | "Then after this, the section known as Sañjaya-yāna [Sanjaya's journey] should be known." |
| `Line 832: प्रजागरं ततः पर्व धृतराष्ट्रस्य चिन्तया ||५०||` | "Then the section called Prajāgara [Sleepless night], with Dhritarashtra's anxieties. ||50||" |
| `Line 833: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 834: पर्व सानत्सुजातं च गुह्यमध्यात्मदर्शनम् |` | "And the Sanat-sujāta section, containing secret spiritual knowledge [metaphysical teachings]." |
| `Line 835: यानसन्धिस्ततः पर्व भगवद्यानमेव च ||५१||` | "Then the section on Yāna-sandhi [Preparation for march], and also the section on Bhagavad-yāna [Lord's journey]. ||51||" |
| `Line 836: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 837: ज्ञेयं विवादपर्वात्र कर्णस्यापि महात्मनः |` | "Here should be known the section on the dispute of the noble-souled Karṇa." |
| `Line 838: निर्याणं पर्व च ततः कुरुपाण्डवसेनयोः ||५२||` | "And then the section on the marching forth of the armies of the Kurus and Pāṇḍavas. ||52||" |
| `Line 839: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 840: रथातिरथसङ्ख्या च पर्वोक्तं तदनन्तरम् |` | "And after that is described the section on the enumeration of charioteers and great charioteers [military rankings]." |
| `Line 841: उलूकदूतागमनं पर्वामर्षविवर्धनम् ||५३||` | "The section on the arrival of Ulūka as messenger, which increases anger [provocation]. ||53||" |
| `Line 842: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 843: अम्बोपाख्यानमपि च पर्व ज्ञेयमतः परम् |` | "And after this should be known the section containing the story of Ambā [Bhishma's nemesis]." |
| `Line 844: भीष्माभिषेचनं पर्व ज्ञेयमद्भुतकारणम् ||५४||` | "The section on the installation of Bhīṣma [as commander], which should be known as causing wonder. ||54||" |
| `Line 845: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 846: जम्बूखण्डविनिर्माणं पर्वोक्तं तदनन्तरम् |` | "After that is described the section on the formation of Jambū-khaṇḍa [geography of India]." |
| `Line 847: भूमिपर्व ततो ज्ञेयं द्वीपविस्तरकीर्तनम् ||५५||` | "Then should be known the Bhūmi Parva [Earth section], describing the extent of the continents [world geography]. ||55||" |
| `Line 848: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 849: पर्वोक्तं भगवद्गीता पर्व भीष्मवधस्ततः |` | "Then is described the section on the Bhagavad Gītā [divine song], and after that the section on the slaying of Bhīṣma." |

| `Line 850: द्रोणाभिषेकः पर्वोक्तं संशप्तकवधस्ततः ||५६||` | "The section on the installation of Droṇa [as commander] is described, and then the slaying of the Saṃśaptakas [oath-bound warriors]. ||56||" |

completed_batches.content:
| **Sanskrit** | **English Translation** |
|-------------|-------------------------|
| `Line 851: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 852: अभिमन्युवधः पर्व प्रतिज्ञापर्व चोच्यते |` | "The Abhimanyu-vadha Parva [Abhimanyu's death section] and the Pratijñā Parva [vow section] are described." |
| `Line 853: जयद्रथवधः पर्व घटोत्कचवधस्ततः ||५७||` | "Then the Jayadratha-vadha Parva [Jayadratha's death section] and after that the Ghatotkaca-vadha [Ghatotkaca's death section]. ||57||" |
| `Line 854: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 855: ततो द्रोणवधः पर्व विज्ञेयं लोमहर्षणम् |` | "Then comes the Drona-vadha Parva [Drona's death section], which should be known as hair-raising [terrifying]." |
| `Line 856: मोक्षो नारायणास्त्रस्य पर्वानन्तरमुच्यते ||५८||` | "The release of the Nārāyaṇāstra [divine weapon] is described in the section immediately following. ||58||" |
| `Line 857: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 858: कर्णपर्व ततो ज्ञेयं शल्यपर्व ततः परम् |` | "Then should be known the Karna Parva [Karna section], and after that the Shalya Parva [Shalya section]." |
| `Line 859: ह्रदप्रवेशनं पर्व गदायुद्धमतः परम् ||५९||` | "The Hrada-praveshana Parva [lake-entering section] and after that the Gadāyuddha [mace battle section]. ||59||" |
| `Line 860: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 861: सारस्वतं ततः पर्व तीर्थवंशगुणान्वितम् |` | "Then the Sarasvata Parva [Sarasvati river section], endowed with the qualities of pilgrimage places and lineages." |
| `Line 862: अत ऊर्ध्वं तु बीभत्सं पर्व सौप्तिकमुच्यते ||६०||` | "After this comes the dreadful Sauptika Parva [sleeping warriors section]. ||60||" |
| `Line 863: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 864: ऐषीकं पर्व निर्दिष्टमत ऊर्ध्वं सुदारुणम् |` | "The Aishika Parva [arrow section] is designated next, which is extremely terrible." |
| `Line 865: जलप्रदानिकं पर्व स्त्रीपर्व च ततः परम् ||६१||` | "The Jala-pradānika Parva [water-offering section] and after that the Stri Parva [women's section]. ||61||" |
| `Line 866: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 867: श्राद्धपर्व ततो ज्ञेयं कुरूणामौर्ध्वदेहिकम् |` | "Then should be known the Shraddha Parva [funeral rites section], concerning the post-death ceremonies of the Kurus." |
| `Line 868: आभिषेचनिकं पर्व धर्मराजस्य धीमतः ||६२||` | "The Abhishechanika Parva [coronation section] of the wise Dharmaraja [Yudhishthira]. ||62||" |
| `Line 869: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 870: चार्वाकनिग्रहः पर्व रक्षसो ब्रह्मरूपिणः |` | "The Charvaka-nigraha Parva [Charvaka's punishment section], about the demon in Brahmin form." |
| `Line 871: प्रविभागो गृहाणां च पर्वोक्तं तदनन्तरम् ||६३||` | "And the distribution of households section is described immediately after that. ||63||" |
| `Line 872: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 873: शान्तिपर्व ततो यत्र राजधर्मानुकीर्तनम् |` | "Then the Shanti Parva [peace section], wherein is the exposition of Raja-dharma [royal duties]." |
| `Line 874: आपद्धर्मश्च पर्वोक्तं मोक्षधर्मस्ततः परम् ||६४||` | "And the Apad-dharma [emergency duties] section is described, followed by the Moksha-dharma [liberation principles]. ||64||" |
| `Line 875: ` | [Blank line] |
translations: | `Line 851: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 852: अभिमन्युवधः पर्व प्रतिज्ञापर्व चोच्यते |` | "The Abhimanyu-vadha Parva [Abhimanyu's death section] and the Pratijñā Parva [vow section] are described." |

| `Line 860: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 861: सारस्वतं ततः पर्व तीर्थवंशगुणान्वितम् |` | "Then the Sarasvata Parva [Sarasvati river section], endowed with the qualities of pilgrimage places and lineages." |

| `Line 866: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 867: श्राद्धपर्व ततो ज्ञेयं कुरूणामौर्ध्वदेहिकम् |` | "Then should be known the Shraddha Parva [funeral rites section], concerning the post-death ceremonies of the Kurus." |

completed_batches.content:
| **Sanskrit** | **English Translation** |
|-------------|-------------------------|
| `Line 876: ततः पर्व परिज्ञेयमानुशासनिकं परम् |` | "Then should be known the supreme Anuśāsanika Parva [Instruction section]," |
| `Line 877: स्वर्गारोहणिकं पर्व ततो भीष्मस्य धीमतः ||६५||` | "And then the Svargārohaṇika Parva [Ascent to Heaven section] of the wise Bhīṣhma. ||65||" |
| `Line 878: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 879: ततोऽश्वमेधिकं पर्व सर्वपापप्रणाशनम् |` | "Then the Aśvamedhika Parva [Horse Sacrifice section], which destroys all sins," |
| `Line 880: अनुगीता ततः पर्व ज्ञेयमध्यात्मवाचकम् ||६६||` | "Then should be known the Anugītā Parva [Subsequent Song section], which speaks of spiritual knowledge. ||66||" |
| `Line 881: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 882: पर्व चाश्रमवासाख्यं पुत्रदर्शनमेव च |` | "And the section called Āśramavāsa [Forest Dwelling] and also the seeing of sons," |
| `Line 883: नारदागमनं पर्व ततः परमिहोच्यते ||६७||` | "Then the section called Nāradāgamana [Nārada's Arrival] is described here next. ||67||" |
| `Line 884: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 885: मौसलं पर्व च ततो घोरं समनुवर्ण्यते |` | "Then the terrible Mausala Parva [Club section] is described," |
| `Line 886: महाप्रस्थानिकं पर्व स्वर्गारोहणिकं ततः ||६८||` | "The Mahāprasthānika Parva [Great Departure section], and then the Svargārohaṇika [Ascent to Heaven section]. ||68||" |
| `Line 887: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 888: हरिवंशस्ततः पर्व पुराणं खिलसञ्ज्ञितम् |` | "Then the Harivaṃśa Parva [Hari's Lineage section], a Purāṇa [ancient text] known as a supplement," |
| `Line 889: भविष्यत्पर्व चाप्युक्तं खिलेष्वेवाद्भुतं महत् ||६९||` | "And also the Bhaviṣyat Parva [Future section] is mentioned, a great and wonderful supplement. ||69||" |
| `Line 890: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 891: एतत्पर्वशतं पूर्णं व्यासेनोक्तं महात्मना |` | "This complete hundred of sections was narrated by the great-souled Vyāsa," |
| `Line 892: यथावत्सूतपुत्रेण लोमहर्षणिना पुनः ||७०||` | "And then properly retold by the son of a sūta [bard], Lomaharṣaṇa. ||70||" |
| `Line 893: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 894: कथितं नैमिषारण्ये पर्वाण्यष्टादशैव तु |` | "Narrated in the Naimiṣāraṇya [Naimiṣa forest], these eighteen sections," |
| `Line 895: समासो भारतस्यायं तत्रोक्तः पर्वसङ्ग्रहः ||७१||` | "This is the summary of the Bhārata, the collection of sections described therein. ||71||" |
| `Line 896: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 897: पौष्ये पर्वणि माहात्म्यमुत्तङ्कस्योपवर्णितम् |` | "In the Pauṣya Parva [Pauṣya section], the greatness of Uttaṅka is described," |
| `Line 898: पौलोमे भृगुवंशस्य विस्तारः परिकीर्तितः ||७२||` | "In the Pauloma [Pauloma section], the expansion of Bhṛgu's lineage is celebrated. ||72||" |
| `Line 899: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 900: आस्तीके सर्वनागानां गरुडस्य च सम्भवः |` | "In the Āstīka [Āstīka section], the origin of all serpents and of Garuḍa [divine eagle]," |
translations: | `Line 876: ततः पर्व परिज्ञेयमानुशासनिकं परम् |` | "Then should be known the supreme Anuśāsanika Parva [Instruction section]," |
| `Line 877: स्वर्गारोहणिकं पर्व ततो भीष्मस्य धीमतः ||६५||` | "And then the Svargārohaṇika Parva [Ascent to Heaven section] of the wise Bhīṣhma. ||65||" |
| `Line 878: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 879: ततोऽश्वमेधिकं पर्व सर्वपापप्रणाशनम् |` | "Then the Aśvamedhika Parva [Horse Sacrifice section], which destroys all sins," |
| `Line 880: अनुगीता ततः पर्व ज्ञेयमध्यात्मवाचकम् ||६६||` | "Then should be known the Anugītā Parva [Subsequent Song section], which speaks of spiritual knowledge. ||66||" |
| `Line 881: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 882: पर्व चाश्रमवासाख्यं पुत्रदर्शनमेव च |` | "And the section called Āśramavāsa [Forest Dwelling] and also the seeing of sons," |
| `Line 883: नारदागमनं पर्व ततः परमिहोच्यते ||६७||` | "Then the section called Nāradāgamana [Nārada's Arrival] is described here next. ||67||" |
| `Line 884: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 885: मौसलं पर्व च ततो घोरं समनुवर्ण्यते |` | "Then the terrible Mausala Parva [Club section] is described," |
| `Line 886: महाप्रस्थानिकं पर्व स्वर्गारोहणिकं ततः ||६८||` | "The Mahāprasthānika Parva [Great Departure section], and then the Svargārohaṇika [Ascent to Heaven section]. ||68||" |
| `Line 887: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 888: हरिवंशस्ततः पर्व पुराणं खिलसञ्ज्ञितम् |` | "Then the Harivaṃśa Parva [Hari's Lineage section], a Purāṇa [ancient text] known as a supplement," |
| `Line 889: भविष्यत्पर्व चाप्युक्तं खिलेष्वेवाद्भुतं महत् ||६९||` | "And also the Bhaviṣyat Parva [Future section] is mentioned, a great and wonderful supplement. ||69||" |
| `Line 890: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 891: एतत्पर्वशतं पूर्णं व्यासेनोक्तं महात्मना |` | "This complete hundred of sections was narrated by the great-souled Vyāsa," |
| `Line 892: यथावत्सूतपुत्रेण लोमहर्षणिना पुनः ||७०||` | "And then properly retold by the son of a sūta [bard], Lomaharṣaṇa. ||70||" |

| `Line 894: कथितं नैमिषारण्ये पर्वाण्यष्टादशैव तु |` | "Narrated in the Naimiṣāraṇya [Naimiṣa forest], these eighteen sections," |
| `Line 895: समासो भारतस्यायं तत्रोक्तः पर्वसङ्ग्रहः ||७१||` | "This is the summary of the Bhārata, the collection of sections described therein. ||71||" |
| `Line 896: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 897: पौष्ये पर्वणि माहात्म्यमुत्तङ्कस्योपवर्णितम् |` | "In the Pauṣya Parva [Pauṣya section], the greatness of Uttaṅka is described," |
| `Line 898: पौलोमे भृगुवंशस्य विस्तारः परिकीर्तितः ||७२||` | "In the Pauloma [Pauloma section], the expansion of Bhṛgu's lineage is celebrated. ||72||" |

completed_batches.content:
| **Sanskrit** | **English Translation** |
|-------------|-------------------------|
| `Line 901: क्षीरोदमथनं चैव जन्मोच्छैःश्रवसस्तथा ||७३||` | "And the churning of the milk ocean [Kshīroda], as well as the birth of Uchchaihshravas [divine horse]. ||73||" |
| `Line 902: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 903: यजतः सर्पसत्रेण राज्ञः पारिक्षितस्य च |` | "And of King Parikshit performing the snake sacrifice [Sarpa-satra]," |
| `Line 904: कथेयमभिनिर्वृत्ता भारतानां महात्मनाम् ||७४||` | "This story is completed about the great-souled Bharatas [Kuru dynasty]. ||74||" |
| `Line 905: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 906: विविधाः सम्भवा राज्ञामुक्ताः सम्भवपर्वणि |` | "Various origins of kings are narrated in the Sambhava Parva [Book of Origins]," |
| `Line 907: अन्येषां चैव विप्राणामृषेर्द्वैपायनस्य च ||७५||` | "And of other Brahmins, and of the sage Dvaipāyana [Vyāsa] as well. ||75||" |
| `Line 908: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 909: अंशावतरणं चात्र देवानां परिकीर्तितम् |` | "The descent of portions [incarnations] of the gods is described here," |
| `Line 910: दैत्यानां दानवानां च यक्षाणां च महौजसाम् ||७६||` | "Of the Daityas [demon class], Dānavas [demon class], and of the mighty Yakshas [wealth spirits]. ||76||" |
| `Line 911: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 912: नागानामथ सर्पाणां गन्धर्वाणां पतत्रिणाम् |` | "Of Nāgas [divine serpents] and serpents, of Gandharvas [celestial musicians] and of winged beings," |
| `Line 913: अन्येषां चैव भूतानां विविधानां समुद्भवः ||७७||` | "And the origin of various other beings as well. ||77||" |
| `Line 914: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 915: वसूनां पुनरुत्पत्तिर्भागीरथ्यां महात्मनाम् |` | "The rebirth of the great-souled Vasus [celestial deities] from Bhāgīrathī [Gangā]," |
| `Line 916: शन्तनोर्वेश्मनि पुनस्तेषां चारोहणं दिवि ||७८||` | "In the house of Shantanu, and their ascension again to heaven. ||78||" |
| `Line 917: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 918: तेजोंशानां च सङ्घाताद्भीष्मस्याप्यत्र सम्भवः |` | "From the collection of portions of splendor, the birth of Bhīshma here," |
| `Line 919: राज्यान्निवर्तनं चैव ब्रह्मचर्यव्रते स्थितिः ||७९||` | "And his renunciation of the kingdom, and establishment in the vow of celibacy [Brahmacharya]. ||79||" |
| `Line 920: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 921: प्रतिज्ञापालनं चैव रक्षा चित्राङ्गदस्य च |` | "And the keeping of his promise, and the protection of Chitrāngada," |
| `Line 922: हते चित्राङ्गदे चैव रक्षा भ्रातुर्यवीयसः ||८०||` | "And when Chitrāngada was slain, the protection of his younger brother. ||80||" |
| `Line 923: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 924: विचित्रवीर्यस्य तथा राज्ये सम्प्रतिपादनम् |` | "The establishment of Vichitravirya in the kingdom," |
| `Line 925: धर्मस्य नृषु सम्भूतिरणीमाण्डव्यशापजा ||८१||` | "The birth of Dharma [Yudhishthira] among men due to the curse of sage Māṇḍavya to Aṇi [Yama]. ||81||" |
translations: | `Line 901: क्षीरोदमथनं चैव जन्मोच्छैःश्रवसस्तथा ||७३||` | "And the churning of the milk ocean [Kshīroda], as well as the birth of Uchchaihshravas [divine horse]. ||73||" |
| `Line 902: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 903: यजतः सर्पसत्रेण राज्ञः पारिक्षितस्य च |` | "And of King Parikshit performing the snake sacrifice [Sarpa-satra]," |
| `Line 904: कथेयमभिनिर्वृत्ता भारतानां महात्मनाम् ||७४||` | "This story is completed about the great-souled Bharatas [Kuru dynasty]. ||74||" |
| `Line 905: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 906: विविधाः सम्भवा राज्ञामुक्ताः सम्भवपर्वणि |` | "Various origins of kings are narrated in the Sambhava Parva [Book of Origins]," |
| `Line 907: अन्येषां चैव विप्राणामृषेर्द्वैपायनस्य च ||७५||` | "And of other Brahmins, and of the sage Dvaipāyana [Vyāsa] as well. ||75||" |
| `Line 908: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 909: अंशावतरणं चात्र देवानां परिकीर्तितम् |` | "The descent of portions [incarnations] of the gods is described here," |
| `Line 910: दैत्यानां दानवानां च यक्षाणां च महौजसाम् ||७६||` | "Of the Daityas [demon class], Dānavas [demon class], and of the mighty Yakshas [wealth spirits]. ||76||" |
| `Line 911: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 912: नागानामथ सर्पाणां गन्धर्वाणां पतत्रिणाम् |` | "Of Nāgas [divine serpents] and serpents, of Gandharvas [celestial musicians] and of winged beings," |
| `Line 913: अन्येषां चैव भूतानां विविधानां समुद्भवः ||७७||` | "And the origin of various other beings as well. ||77||" |
| `Line 914: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 915: वसूनां पुनरुत्पत्तिर्भागीरथ्यां महात्मनाम् |` | "The rebirth of the great-souled Vasus [celestial deities] from Bhāgīrathī [Gangā]," |
| `Line 916: शन्तनोर्वेश्मनि पुनस्तेषां चारोहणं दिवि ||७८||` | "In the house of Shantanu, and their ascension again to heaven. ||78||" |
| `Line 917: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 918: तेजोंशानां च सङ्घाताद्भीष्मस्याप्यत्र सम्भवः |` | "From the collection of portions of splendor, the birth of Bhīshma here," |
| `Line 919: राज्यान्निवर्तनं चैव ब्रह्मचर्यव्रते स्थितिः ||७९||` | "And his renunciation of the kingdom, and establishment in the vow of celibacy [Brahmacharya]. ||79||" |
| `Line 920: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 921: प्रतिज्ञापालनं चैव रक्षा चित्राङ्गदस्य च |` | "And the keeping of his promise, and the protection of Chitrāngada," |
| `Line 922: हते चित्राङ्गदे चैव रक्षा भ्रातुर्यवीयसः ||८०||` | "And when Chitrāngada was slain, the protection of his younger brother. ||80||" |
| `Line 923: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 924: विचित्रवीर्यस्य तथा राज्ये सम्प्रतिपादनम् |` | "The establishment of Vichitravirya in the kingdom," |
| `Line 925: धर्मस्य नृषु सम्भूतिरणीमाण्डव्यशापजा ||८१||` | "The birth of Dharma [Yudhishthira] among men due to the curse of sage Māṇḍavya to Aṇi [Yama]. ||81||" |

| `Line 926: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 927: कृष्णद्वैपायनाच्चैव प्रसूतिर्वरदानजा |` | "And from Krishna Dvaipāyana [Vyāsa], births resulting from the boon," |
| `Line 928: धृतराष्ट्रस्य पाण्डोश्च पाण्डवानां च सम्भवः ||८२||` | "The birth of Dhritarāshtra and Pāndu, and the origin of the Pāndavas. ||82||" |
| `Line 929: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 930: वारणावतयात्रा च मन्त्रो दुर्योधनस्य च |` | "The journey to Vāranāvata [city name] and the conspiracy of Duryodhana," |
| `Line 931: विदुरस्य च वाक्येन सुरुङ्गोपक्रमक्रिया ||८३||` | "And by Vidura's words, the construction of the underground passage. ||83||" |
| `Line 932: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 933: पाण्डवानां वने घोरे हिडिम्बायाश्च दर्शनम् |` | "The Pāndavas' encounter with Hidimbā [rākshasi] in the terrible forest," |
| `Line 934: घटोत्कचस्य चोत्पत्तिरत्रैव परिकीर्तिता ||८४||` | "And the birth of Ghatotkaca is also narrated here. ||84||" |
| `Line 935: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 936: अज्ञातचर्या पाण्डूनां वासो ब्राह्मणवेश्मनि |` | "The Pāndavas' living incognito in the house of a Brahmin [priest]," |
| `Line 937: बकस्य निधनं चैव नागराणां च विस्मयः ||८५||` | "And the killing of Baka [demon], and the amazement of the townspeople. ||85||" |
| `Line 938: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 939: अङ्गारपर्णं निर्जित्य गङ्गाकूलेऽर्जुनस्तदा |` | "Having defeated Aṅgāraparna [king], Arjuna then, on the banks of the Ganges [sacred river]," |
| `Line 940: भ्रातृभिः सहितः सर्वैः पाञ्चालानभितो ययौ ||८६||` | "Together with all his brothers, proceeded toward the Pāñcālas [kingdom]. ||86||" |
| `Line 941: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 942: तापत्यमथ वासिष्ठमौर्वं चाख्यानमुत्तमम् |` | "The tale of Tāpatya [sun's descendant], Vāsiṣṭha [sage], and Aurva [sage], the excellent narrative," |
| `Line 943: पञ्चेन्द्राणामुपाख्यानमत्रैवाद्भुतमुच्यते ||८७||` | "The wondrous story of the five Indras [deities] is told here. ||87||" |
| `Line 944: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 945: पञ्चानामेकपत्नीत्वे विमर्शो द्रुपदस्य च |` | "The deliberation on the five (brothers) having one wife, and of Drupada [king]," |
| `Line 946: द्रौपद्या देवविहितो विवाहश्चाप्यमानुषः ||८८||` | "And Draupadī's divinely ordained marriage, which was superhuman. ||88||" |
| `Line 947: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 948: विदुरस्य च सम्प्राप्तिर्दर्शनं केशवस्य च |` | "The arrival of Vidura and the meeting with Keshava [Krishna]," |
| `Line 949: खाण्डवप्रस्थवासश्च तथा राज्यार्धशासनम् ||८९||` | "The dwelling at Khāṇḍavaprastha [city] and the ruling of half the kingdom. ||89||" |
| `Line 950: ` | [Blank line] |
translations: | `Line 926: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 927: कृष्णद्वैपायनाच्चैव प्रसूतिर्वरदानजा |` | "And from Krishna Dvaipāyana [Vyāsa], births resulting from the boon," |
| `Line 928: धृतराष्ट्रस्य पाण्डोश्च पाण्डवानां च सम्भवः ||८२||` | "The birth of Dhritarāshtra and Pāndu, and the origin of the Pāndavas. ||82||" |
| `Line 929: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 930: वारणावतयात्रा च मन्त्रो दुर्योधनस्य च |` | "The journey to Vāranāvata [city name] and the conspiracy of Duryodhana," |
| `Line 931: विदुरस्य च वाक्येन सुरुङ्गोपक्रमक्रिया ||८३||` | "And by Vidura's words, the construction of the underground passage. ||83||" |
| `Line 932: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 933: पाण्डवानां वने घोरे हिडिम्बायाश्च दर्शनम् |` | "The Pāndavas' encounter with Hidimbā [rākshasi] in the terrible forest," |
| `Line 934: घटोत्कचस्य चोत्पत्तिरत्रैव परिकीर्तिता ||८४||` | "And the birth of Ghatotkaca is also narrated here. ||84||" |
| `Line 935: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 936: अज्ञातचर्या पाण्डूनां वासो ब्राह्मणवेश्मनि |` | "The Pāndavas' living incognito in the house of a Brahmin [priest]," |
| `Line 937: बकस्य निधनं चैव नागराणां च विस्मयः ||८५||` | "And the killing of Baka [demon], and the amazement of the townspeople. ||85||" |
| `Line 938: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 939: अङ्गारपर्णं निर्जित्य गङ्गाकूलेऽर्जुनस्तदा |` | "Having defeated Aṅgāraparna [king], Arjuna then, on the banks of the Ganges [sacred river]," |
| `Line 940: भ्रातृभिः सहितः सर्वैः पाञ्चालानभितो ययौ ||८६||` | "Together with all his brothers, proceeded toward the Pāñcālas [kingdom]. ||86||" |
| `Line 941: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 942: तापत्यमथ वासिष्ठमौर्वं चाख्यानमुत्तमम् |` | "The tale of Tāpatya [sun's descendant], Vāsiṣṭha [sage], and Aurva [sage], the excellent narrative," |
| `Line 943: पञ्चेन्द्राणामुपाख्यानमत्रैवाद्भुतमुच्यते ||८७||` | "The wondrous story of the five Indras [deities] is told here. ||87||" |
| `Line 944: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 945: पञ्चानामेकपत्नीत्वे विमर्शो द्रुपदस्य च |` | "The deliberation on the five (brothers) having one wife, and of Drupada [king]," |
| `Line 946: द्रौपद्या देवविहितो विवाहश्चाप्यमानुषः ||८८||` | "And Draupadī's divinely ordained marriage, which was superhuman. ||88||" |
| `Line 947: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 948: विदुरस्य च सम्प्राप्तिर्दर्शनं केशवस्य च |` | "The arrival of Vidura and the meeting with Keshava [Krishna]," |
| `Line 949: खाण्डवप्रस्थवासश्च तथा राज्यार्धशासनम् ||८९||` | "The dwelling at Khāṇḍavaprastha [city] and the ruling of half the kingdom. ||89||" |

completed_batches.content:
| **Sanskrit** | **English Translation** |
|-------------|-------------------------|
| `Line 951: नारदस्याज्ञया चैव द्रौपद्याः समयक्रिया |` | "By Nārada's [divine sage] command, the agreement regarding Draupadī [Pāṇḍavas' wife]," |
| `Line 952: सुन्दोपसुन्दयोस्तत्र उपाख्यानं प्रकीर्तितम् ||९०||` | "And there the tale of Sunda and Upasunda was narrated. ||90||" |
| `Line 953: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 954: पार्थस्य वनवासश्च उलूप्या पथि सङ्गमः |` | "Pārtha's [Arjuna's] forest dwelling and his meeting with Ulūpī [Nāga princess] on the way," |
| `Line 955: पुण्यतीर्थानुसंयानं बभ्रुवाहनजन्म च ||९१||` | "His pilgrimage to sacred places and the birth of Babhruvāhana [Arjuna's son]. ||91||" |
| `Line 956: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 957: द्वारकायां सुभद्रा च कामयानेन कामिनी |` | "And in Dvārakā, Subhadrā [Krishna's sister], the passionate one, by the desiring one," |
| `Line 958: वासुदेवस्यानुमते प्राप्ता चैव किरीटिना ||९२||` | "Was obtained by the diadem-wearer [Arjuna] with Vāsudeva's [Krishna's] consent. ||92||" |
| `Line 959: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 960: हरणं गृह्य सम्प्राप्ते कृष्णे देवकिनन्दने |` | "The abduction being accomplished, when Krishna, son of Devakī, arrived," |
| `Line 961: सम्प्राप्तिश्चक्रधनुषोः खाण्डवस्य च दाहनम् ||९३||` | "The acquisition of the discus and bow, and the burning of the Khāṇḍava forest. ||93||" |
| `Line 962: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 963: अभिमन्योः सुभद्रायां जन्म चोत्तमतेजसः |` | "The birth of the supremely radiant Abhimanyu to Subhadrā," |
| `Line 964: मयस्य मोक्षो ज्वलनाद्भुजङ्गस्य च मोक्षणम् ||९४||` | "The release of Maya [asura architect] from the fire, and the liberation of the serpent. ||94||" |
| `Line 965: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 966: महर्षेर्मन्दपालस्य शार्ङ्ग्यं तनयसम्भवः ||९४||` | "The birth of the son of the great sage Mandapāla in the Śārṅgya [bird] form. ||94||" |
| `Line 967: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 968: इत्येतदाधिपर्वोक्तं प्रथमं बहुविस्तरम् |` | "Thus this first extensive Ādi Parva [beginning book] has been narrated," |
| `Line 969: अध्यायानां शते द्वे तु सङ्ख्याते परमर्षिणा ||९५||` | "Comprising two hundred chapters as counted by the supreme sage. ||95||" |
| `Line 970: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 971: अष्टादशैव चाध्याया व्यासेनोत्तमतेजसा ||९५||` | "And eighteen chapters by the supremely radiant Vyāsa. ||95||" |
| `Line 972: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 973: सप्त श्लोकसहस्राणि तथा नव शतानि च |` | "Seven thousand and nine hundred verses," |
| `Line 974: श्लोकाश्च चतुराशीतिर्दृष्टो ग्रन्थो महात्मना ||९६||` | "And eighty-four verses - this text was composed by the great soul. ||96||" |
| `Line 975: ` | [Blank line] |
translations: | `Line 951: नारदस्याज्ञया चैव द्रौपद्याः समयक्रिया |` | "By Nārada's [divine sage] command, the agreement regarding Draupadī [Pāṇḍavas' wife]," |
| `Line 952: सुन्दोपसुन्दयोस्तत्र उपाख्यानं प्रकीर्तितम् ||९०||` | "And there the tale of Sunda and Upasunda was narrated. ||90||" |
| `Line 953: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 954: पार्थस्य वनवासश्च उलूप्या पथि सङ्गमः |` | "Pārtha's [Arjuna's] forest dwelling and his meeting with Ulūpī [Nāga princess] on the way," |
| `Line 955: पुण्यतीर्थानुसंयानं बभ्रुवाहनजन्म च ||९१||` | "His pilgrimage to sacred places and the birth of Babhruvāhana [Arjuna's son]. ||91||" |
| `Line 956: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 957: द्वारकायां सुभद्रा च कामयानेन कामिनी |` | "And in Dvārakā, Subhadrā [Krishna's sister], the passionate one, by the desiring one," |
| `Line 958: वासुदेवस्यानुमते प्राप्ता चैव किरीटिना ||९२||` | "Was obtained by the diadem-wearer [Arjuna] with Vāsudeva's [Krishna's] consent. ||92||" |
| `Line 959: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 960: हरणं गृह्य सम्प्राप्ते कृष्णे देवकिनन्दने |` | "The abduction being accomplished, when Krishna, son of Devakī, arrived," |
| `Line 961: सम्प्राप्तिश्चक्रधनुषोः खाण्डवस्य च दाहनम् ||९३||` | "The acquisition of the discus and bow, and the burning of the Khāṇḍava forest. ||93||" |
| `Line 962: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 963: अभिमन्योः सुभद्रायां जन्म चोत्तमतेजसः |` | "The birth of the supremely radiant Abhimanyu to Subhadrā," |
| `Line 964: मयस्य मोक्षो ज्वलनाद्भुजङ्गस्य च मोक्षणम् ||९४||` | "The release of Maya [asura architect] from the fire, and the liberation of the serpent. ||94||" |
| `Line 965: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 966: महर्षेर्मन्दपालस्य शार्ङ्ग्यं तनयसम्भवः ||९४||` | "The birth of the son of the great sage Mandapāla in the Śārṅgya [bird] form. ||94||" |
| `Line 967: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 968: इत्येतदाधिपर्वोक्तं प्रथमं बहुविस्तरम् |` | "Thus this first extensive Ādi Parva [beginning book] has been narrated," |
| `Line 969: अध्यायानां शते द्वे तु सङ्ख्याते परमर्षिणा ||९५||` | "Comprising two hundred chapters as counted by the supreme sage. ||95||" |
| `Line 970: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 971: अष्टादशैव चाध्याया व्यासेनोत्तमतेजसा ||९५||` | "And eighteen chapters by the supremely radiant Vyāsa. ||95||" |
| `Line 972: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 973: सप्त श्लोकसहस्राणि तथा नव शतानि च |` | "Seven thousand and nine hundred verses," |
| `Line 974: श्लोकाश्च चतुराशीतिर्दृष्टो ग्रन्थो महात्मना ||९६||` | "And eighty-four verses - this text was composed by the great soul. ||96||" |
| `Line 975: ` | [Blank line] |

completed_batches.content:
| **Sanskrit** | **English Translation** |
|-------------|-------------------------|
| `Line 976: द्वितीयं तु सभापर्व बहुवृत्तान्तमुच्यते |` | "The second, the Sabha Parva [Assembly Book], is said to contain many episodes." |
| `Line 977: सभाक्रिया पाण्डवानां किङ्कराणां च दर्शनम् ||९७||` | "The construction of the assembly hall by the Pandavas and the appearance of the servants. ||97||" |
| `Line 978: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 979: लोकपालसभाख्यानं नारदाद्देवदर्शनात् |` | "The description of the assemblies of the Lokapalas [world guardians] as seen by Narada among the gods." |
| `Line 980: राजसूयस्य चारम्भो जरासन्धवधस्तथा ||९८||` | "The commencement of the Rajasuya [royal sacrifice] and the slaying of Jarasandha. ||98||" |
| `Line 981: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 982: गिरिव्रजे निरुद्धानां राज्ञां कृष्णेन मोक्षणम् |` | "The liberation by Krishna of the kings imprisoned in Girivraja [mountain fortress]." |
| `Line 983: राजसूयेऽर्घसंवादे शिशुपालवधस्तथा ||९९||` | "The slaying of Shishupala during the dispute about the offering at the Rajasuya sacrifice. ||99||" |
| `Line 984: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 985: यज्ञे विभूतिं तां दृष्ट्वा दुःखामर्षान्वितस्य च |` | "Having seen that splendor at the sacrifice, and filled with sorrow and envy," |
| `Line 986: दुर्योधनस्यावहासो भीमेन च सभातले ||१००||` | "Duryodhana was mocked by Bhima on the floor of the assembly hall. ||100||" |
| `Line 987: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 988: यत्रास्य मन्युरुद्भूतो येन द्यूतमकारयत् |` | "Where his anger arose, because of which he arranged the gambling match." |
| `Line 989: यत्र धर्मसुतं द्यूते शकुनिः कितवोऽजयत् ||१०१||` | "Where Shakuni, the deceitful gambler, defeated Dharma's son [Yudhishthira] in the game. ||101||" |
| `Line 990: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 991: यत्र द्यूतार्णवे मग्नान्द्रौपदी नौरिवार्णवात् |` | "Where Draupadi, like a boat in the ocean, rescued those who were drowning in the ocean of gambling." |
| `Line 992: तारयामास तांस्तीर्णाञ्ज्ञात्वा दुर्योधनो नृपः ||१०२||` | "King Duryodhana, knowing they had been saved, ||102||" |
| `Line 993: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 994: पुनरेव ततो द्यूते समाह्वयत पाण्डवान् ||१०२||` | "Again challenged the Pandavas to another game of dice. ||102||" |
| `Line 995: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 996: एतत्सर्वं सभापर्व समाख्यातं महात्मना |` | "All this is narrated in the Sabha Parva by the great-souled one [Vyasa]." |
| `Line 997: अध्यायाः सप्ततिर्ज्ञेयास्तथा द्वौ चात्र सङ्ख्यया ||१०३||` | "Seventy-two chapters are to be known here by count. ||103||" |
| `Line 998: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 999: श्लोकानां द्वे सहस्रे तु पञ्च श्लोकशतानि च |` | "Two thousand and five hundred verses," |
| `Line 1000: श्लोकाश्चैकादश ज्ञेयाः पर्वण्यस्मिन्प्रकीर्तिताः ||१०४||` | "And eleven verses are to be known as proclaimed in this Parva [book section]. ||104||" |
translations: | `Line 976: द्वितीयं तु सभापर्व बहुवृत्तान्तमुच्यते |` | "The second, the Sabha Parva [Assembly Book], is said to contain many episodes." |
| `Line 977: सभाक्रिया पाण्डवानां किङ्कराणां च दर्शनम् ||९७||` | "The construction of the assembly hall by the Pandavas and the appearance of the servants. ||97||" |
| `Line 978: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 979: लोकपालसभाख्यानं नारदाद्देवदर्शनात् |` | "The description of the assemblies of the Lokapalas [world guardians] as seen by Narada among the gods." |
| `Line 980: राजसूयस्य चारम्भो जरासन्धवधस्तथा ||९८||` | "The commencement of the Rajasuya [royal sacrifice] and the slaying of Jarasandha. ||98||" |
| `Line 981: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 982: गिरिव्रजे निरुद्धानां राज्ञां कृष्णेन मोक्षणम् |` | "The liberation by Krishna of the kings imprisoned in Girivraja [mountain fortress]." |
| `Line 983: राजसूयेऽर्घसंवादे शिशुपालवधस्तथा ||९९||` | "The slaying of Shishupala during the dispute about the offering at the Rajasuya sacrifice. ||99||" |
| `Line 984: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 985: यज्ञे विभूतिं तां दृष्ट्वा दुःखामर्षान्वितस्य च |` | "Having seen that splendor at the sacrifice, and filled with sorrow and envy," |
| `Line 986: दुर्योधनस्यावहासो भीमेन च सभातले ||१००||` | "Duryodhana was mocked by Bhima on the floor of the assembly hall. ||100||" |
| `Line 987: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 988: यत्रास्य मन्युरुद्भूतो येन द्यूतमकारयत् |` | "Where his anger arose, because of which he arranged the gambling match." |
| `Line 989: यत्र धर्मसुतं द्यूते शकुनिः कितवोऽजयत् ||१०१||` | "Where Shakuni, the deceitful gambler, defeated Dharma's son [Yudhishthira] in the game. ||101||" |
| `Line 990: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 991: यत्र द्यूतार्णवे मग्नान्द्रौपदी नौरिवार्णवात् |` | "Where Draupadi, like a boat in the ocean, rescued those who were drowning in the ocean of gambling." |
| `Line 992: तारयामास तांस्तीर्णाञ्ज्ञात्वा दुर्योधनो नृपः ||१०२||` | "King Duryodhana, knowing they had been saved, ||102||" |
| `Line 993: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 994: पुनरेव ततो द्यूते समाह्वयत पाण्डवान् ||१०२||` | "Again challenged the Pandavas to another game of dice. ||102||" |
| `Line 995: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 996: एतत्सर्वं सभापर्व समाख्यातं महात्मना |` | "All this is narrated in the Sabha Parva by the great-souled one [Vyasa]." |
| `Line 997: अध्यायाः सप्ततिर्ज्ञेयास्तथा द्वौ चात्र सङ्ख्यया ||१०३||` | "Seventy-two chapters are to be known here by count. ||103||" |
| `Line 998: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 999: श्लोकानां द्वे सहस्रे तु पञ्च श्लोकशतानि च |` | "Two thousand and five hundred verses," |
| `Line 1000: श्लोकाश्चैकादश ज्ञेयाः पर्वण्यस्मिन्प्रकीर्तिताः ||१०४||` | "And eleven verses are to be known as proclaimed in this Parva [book section]. ||104||" |

|-------------|-------------------------|
| `Line 5501: यथा सोमो द्विजश्रेष्ठ शुक्लपक्षोदितो दिवि ||१६||` | "Like the moon, O best of the twice-born [eminent Brahmin], rising in the sky during the bright fortnight. ||16||" |
| `Line 5502: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5503: यथाकालं तु सा ब्रह्मन्प्रजज्ञे भुजगस्वसा |` | "In due time, O Brahmin, that sister of the serpents gave birth" |
| `Line 5504: कुमारं देवगर्भाभं पितृमातृभयापहम् ||१७||` | "To a boy radiant like a divine embryo, who would remove the fear of his father and mother. ||17||" |
| `Line 5505: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5506: ववृधे स च तत्रैव नागराजनिवेशने |` | "And he grew up there in the abode of the serpent king," |
| `Line 5507: वेदांश्चाधिजगे साङ्गान्भार्गवाच्च्यवनात्मजात् ||१८||` | "And he mastered the Vedas with their auxiliary texts [Vedangas] from Bhargava, the son of Chyavana. ||18||" |
| `Line 5508: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5509: चरितव्रतो बाल एव बुद्धिसत्त्वगुणान्वितः |` | "Even as a child, he observed his vows, endowed with intelligence, purity, and good qualities," |
| `Line 5510: नाम चास्याभवत्ख्यातं लोकेष्वास्तीक इत्युत ||१९||` | "And his name became renowned in the worlds as Astika. ||19||" |
| `Line 5511: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5512: अस्तीत्युक्त्वा गतो यस्मात्पिता गर्भस्थमेव तम् |` | "Since his father had departed saying 'asti' [he exists] when he was still in the womb," |
| `Line 5513: वनं तस्मादिदं तस्य नामास्तीकेति विश्रुतम् ||२०||` | "Therefore his name became famous as Astika. ||20||" |
| `Line 5514: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5515: स बाल एव तत्रस्थश्चरन्नमितबुद्धिमान् |` | "Even as a child, living there, moving about, with immeasurable intelligence," |
| `Line 5516: गृहे पन्नगराजस्य प्रयत्नात्पर्यरक्ष्यत ||२१||` | "He was carefully protected in the house of the serpent king. ||21||" |
| `Line 5517: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5518: भगवानिव देवेशः शूलपाणिर्हिरण्यदः |` | "Like the lord of gods, the trident-bearer [Shiva], the giver of gold," |
| `Line 5519: विवर्धमानः सर्वांस्तान्पन्नगानभ्यहर्षयत् ||२२||` | "As he grew, he delighted all those serpents. ||22||" |
| `Line 5520: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5521: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5522: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5523: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5524: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5525: ` | [Blank line] |

| `Line 5513: वनं तस्मादिदं तस्य नामास्तीकेति विश्रुतम् ||२०||` | "Therefore his name became famous as Astika. ||20||" |

| `Line 5515: स बाल एव तत्रस्थश्चरन्नमितबुद्धिमान् |` | "Even as a child, living there, moving about, with immeasurable intelligence," |
| `Line 5516: गृहे पन्नगराजस्य प्रयत्नात्पर्यरक्ष्यत ||२१||` | "He was carefully protected in the house of the serpent king. ||21||" |

| `Line 5518: भगवानिव देवेशः शूलपाणिर्हिरण्यदः |` | "Like the lord of gods, the trident-bearer [Shiva], the giver of gold," |

|-------------|-------------------------|
| `Line 5551: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5552: धर्मात्मा च महात्मा च प्रजापालः पिता तव |` | "Righteous-souled and great-souled, a protector of subjects was your father," |
| `Line 5553: आसीदिह यथावृत्तः स महात्मा शृणुष्व तत् ||६||` | "He was here as described, that great soul - listen to that. ||6||" |
| `Line 5554: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5555: चातुर्वर्ण्यं स्वधर्मस्थं स कृत्वा पर्यरक्षत |` | "Having established the four varnas [social orders] in their respective duties, he protected them," |
| `Line 5556: धर्मतो धर्मविद्राजा धर्मो विग्रहवानिव ||७||` | "Righteously did that king, knower of dharma, like dharma personified. ||7||" |
| `Line 5557: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5558: ररक्ष पृथिवीं देवीं श्रीमानतुलविक्रमः |` | "He protected the divine Earth, that glorious one of matchless valor," |
| `Line 5559: द्वेष्टारस्तस्य नैवासन्स च न द्वेष्टि कञ्चन ||८||` | "He had no enemies, nor did he hate anyone. ||8||" |
| `Line 5560: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5561: समः सर्वेषु भूतेषु प्रजापतिरिवाभवत् ||८||` | "Equal toward all beings, he was like Prajapati [creator deity]. ||8||" |
| `Line 5562: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5563: ब्राह्मणाः क्षत्रिया वैश्याः शूद्राश्चैव स्वकर्मसु |` | "Brahmins, Kshatriyas, Vaishyas, and Shudras in their respective duties," |
| `Line 5564: स्थिताः सुमनसो राजंस्तेन राज्ञा स्वनुष्ठिताः ||९||` | "Were established contentedly, O king, by that king's proper governance. ||9||" |
| `Line 5565: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5566: विधवानाथकृपणान्विकलांश्च बभार सः |` | "He supported widows, orphans, the poor, and the disabled," |
| `Line 5567: सुदर्शः सर्वभूतानामासीत्सोम इवापरः ||१०||` | "Pleasing to behold by all beings, he was like another Soma [moon deity]. ||10||" |
| `Line 5568: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5569: तुष्टपुष्टजनः श्रीमान्सत्यवाग्दृढविक्रमः |` | "With satisfied and nourished subjects, glorious, truthful in speech, of firm valor," |
| `Line 5570: धनुर्वेदे च शिष्योऽभून्नृपः शारद्वतस्य सः ||११||` | "In archery, that king was a disciple of Sharadwata [sage teacher]. ||11||" |
| `Line 5571: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5572: गोविन्दस्य प्रियश्चासीत्पिता ते जनमेजय |` | "Dear to Govinda [Krishna] was your father, O Janamejaya," |
| `Line 5573: लोकस्य चैव सर्वस्य प्रिय आसीन्महायशाः ||१२||` | "And dear to all the world was that highly renowned one. ||12||" |
| `Line 5574: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5575: परिक्षीणेषु कुरुषु उत्तरायामजायत |` | "When the Kurus were nearly extinct, he was born to Uttara [princess]," |
translations: | `Line 5551: ` | "[Blank line]" |

| `Line 5553: आसीदिह यथावृत्तः स महात्मा शृणुष्व तत् ||६||` | "He was here as described, that great soul - listen to that. ||6||" |
| `Line 5554: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5555: चातुर्वर्ण्यं स्वधर्मस्थं स कृत्वा पर्यरक्षत |` | "Having established the four varnas [social orders] in their respective duties, he protected them," |
| `Line 5556: धर्मतो धर्मविद्राजा धर्मो विग्रहवानिव ||७||` | "Righteously did that king, knower of dharma, like dharma personified. ||7||" |

| `Line 5559: द्वेष्टारस्तस्य नैवासन्स च न द्वेष्टि कञ्चन ||८||` | "He had no enemies, nor did he hate anyone. ||8||" |
| `Line 5560: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5561: समः सर्वेषु भूतेषु प्रजापतिरिवाभवत् ||८||` | "Equal toward all beings, he was like Prajapati [creator deity]. ||8||" |
| `Line 5562: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5563: ब्राह्मणाः क्षत्रिया वैश्याः शूद्राश्चैव स्वकर्मसु |` | "Brahmins, Kshatriyas, Vaishyas, and Shudras in their respective duties," |
| `Line 5564: स्थिताः सुमनसो राजंस्तेन राज्ञा स्वनुष्ठिताः ||९||` | "Were established contentedly, O king, by that king's proper governance. ||9||" |
| `Line 5565: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5566: विधवानाथकृपणान्विकलांश्च बभार सः |` | "He supported widows, orphans, the poor, and the disabled," |
| `Line 5567: सुदर्शः सर्वभूतानामासीत्सोम इवापरः ||१०||` | "Pleasing to behold by all beings, he was like another Soma [moon deity]. ||10||" |
| `Line 5568: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5569: तुष्टपुष्टजनः श्रीमान्सत्यवाग्दृढविक्रमः |` | "With satisfied and nourished subjects, glorious, truthful in speech, of firm valor," |
| `Line 5570: धनुर्वेदे च शिष्योऽभून्नृपः शारद्वतस्य सः ||११||` | "In archery, that king was a disciple of Sharadwata [sage teacher]. ||11||" |
| `Line 5571: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5572: गोविन्दस्य प्रियश्चासीत्पिता ते जनमेजय |` | "Dear to Govinda [Krishna] was your father, O Janamejaya," |
| `Line 5573: लोकस्य चैव सर्वस्य प्रिय आसीन्महायशाः ||१२||` | "And dear to all the world was that highly renowned one. ||12||" |
| `Line 5574: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5575: परिक्षीणेषु कुरुषु उत्तरायामजायत |` | "When the Kurus were nearly extinct, he was born to Uttara [princess]," |

completed_batches.content:
| **Sanskrit** | **English Translation** |
|-------------|-------------------------|
| `Line 5451: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5452: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5453: सूत उवाच||` | "Sūta [bard-narrator] said:" |
| `Line 5454: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5455: गतमात्रं तु भर्तारं जरत्कारुरवेदयत् |` | "As soon as her husband had departed, Jaratkāru [female sage] informed" |
| `Line 5456: भ्रातुस्त्वरितमागम्य यथातथ्यं तपोधन ||१||` | "Her brother, quickly approaching him, the truth exactly as it happened, O wealth of austerities [sage]. ||1||" |
| `Line 5457: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5458: ततः स भुजगश्रेष्ठः श्रुत्वा सुमहदप्रियम् |` | "Then that foremost of serpents [Vāsuki], hearing this greatly unpleasant news," |
| `Line 5459: उवाच भगिनीं दीनां तदा दीनतरः स्वयम् ||२||` | "Spoke to his distressed sister, himself even more distressed then. ||2||" |
| `Line 5460: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5461: जानासि भद्रे यत्कार्यं प्रदाने कारणं च यत् |` | "You know, O auspicious one, what purpose and reason there was in giving you away," |
| `Line 5462: पन्नगानां हितार्थाय पुत्रस्ते स्यात्ततो यदि ||३||` | "For the welfare of the serpents [nāgas], if a son would be born to you from him. ||3||" |
| `Line 5463: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5464: स सर्पसत्रात्किल नो मोक्षयिष्यति वीर्यवान् |` | "That mighty one will indeed liberate us from the serpent sacrifice [Sarpa-satra]," |
| `Line 5465: एवं पितामहः पूर्वमुक्तवान्मां सुरैः सह ||४||` | "Thus had the Grandfather [Brahmā] previously told me along with the gods. ||4||" |
| `Line 5466: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5467: अप्यस्ति गर्भः सुभगे तस्मात्ते मुनिसत्तमात् |` | "Is there a child, O fortunate one, from that best of sages in you?" |
| `Line 5468: न चेच्छाम्यफलं तस्य दारकर्म मनीषिणः ||५||` | "I do not wish the marriage ceremony of that wise one to be fruitless. ||5||" |
| `Line 5469: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5470: कामं च मम न न्याय्यं प्रष्टुं त्वां कार्यमीदृशम् |` | "Indeed, it is not proper for me to ask you about such a matter," |
| `Line 5471: किं तु कार्यगरीयस्त्वात्ततस्त्वाहमचूचुदम् ||६||` | "But due to the importance of the task, therefore I urged you. ||6||" |
| `Line 5472: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5473: दुर्वासतां विदित्वा च भर्तुस्तेऽतितपस्विनः |` | "And knowing the irritable nature of your husband, that great ascetic," |
| `Line 5474: नैनमन्वागमिष्यामि कदाचिद्धि शपेत्स माम् ||७||` | "I will not follow after him, for he might indeed curse me. ||7||" |
| `Line 5475: ` | [Blank line] |

| `Line 5626: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5627: मृतं सर्पं धनुष्कोट्या समुत्क्षिप्य धरातलात् |` | "Having lifted a dead serpent from the ground with the end of his bow," |
| `Line 5628: तस्य शुद्धात्मनः प्रादात्स्कन्धे भरतसत्तम ||२७||` | "He placed it on the shoulders of that pure-souled one, O best of Bharatas [noble lineage]. ||27||" |
| `Line 5629: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5630: न चोवाच स मेधावी तमथो साध्वसाधु वा |` | "And that wise one neither said to him whether it was good or bad," |
| `Line 5631: तस्थौ तथैव चाक्रुध्यन्सर्पं स्कन्धेन धारयन् ||२८||` | "He stood just as he was, without anger, bearing the serpent on his shoulder. ||28||" |
| `Line 5632: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5633: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5634: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5635: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5636: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5637: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5638: ४६` | "46 [chapter number]" |
| `Line 5639: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5640: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5641: मन्त्रिण ऊचुः||` | "The ministers said:" |
| `Line 5642: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5643: ततः स राजा राजेन्द्र स्कन्धे तस्य भुजङ्गमम् |` | "Then that king, O lord of kings, having placed the serpent on the shoulder," |
| `Line 5644: मुनेः क्षुत्क्षाम आसज्य स्वपुरं पुनराययौ ||१||` | "Of the sage who was emaciated from hunger, returned again to his city. ||1||" |
| `Line 5645: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5646: ऋषेस्तस्य तु पुत्रोऽभूद्गवि जातो महायशाः |` | "But that sage had a son, born of a cow [miraculous birth], of great fame," |
| `Line 5647: शृङ्गी नाम महातेजास्तिग्मवीर्योऽतिकोपनः ||२||` | "Shringi by name, of great splendor, of fierce power and extremely wrathful. ||2||" |
| `Line 5648: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5649: ब्रह्माणं सोऽभ्युपागम्य मुनिः पूजां चकार ह |` | "That sage, having approached Brahman [creator deity], performed worship," |
| `Line 5650: अनुज्ञातो गतस्तत्र शृङ्गी शुश्राव तं तदा ||३||` | "Having been permitted, Shringi went there and then heard about it. ||3||" |

completed_batches.content:
| **Sanskrit** | **English Translation** |
|-------------|-------------------------|
| `Line 5476: आचक्ष्व भद्रे भर्तुस्त्वं सर्वमेव विचेष्टितम् |` | "Tell me, auspicious one, all about your husband's actions," |
| `Line 5477: शल्यमुद्धर मे घोरं भद्रे हृदि चिरस्थितम् ||८||` | "Remove, O blessed one, the terrible arrow [of worry] that has long been lodged in my heart. ||8||" |
| `Line 5478: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5479: जरत्कारुस्ततो वाक्यमित्युक्ता प्रत्यभाषत |` | "Jaratkāru, thus addressed, replied with these words," |
| `Line 5480: आश्वासयन्ती सन्तप्तं वासुकिं पन्नगेश्वरम् ||९||` | "Consoling the distressed Vāsuki, the lord of serpents [nāga king]. ||9||" |
| `Line 5481: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5482: पृष्टो मयापत्यहेतोः स महात्मा महातपाः |` | "When asked by me about offspring, that great-souled one of great austerities," |
| `Line 5483: अस्तीत्युदरमुद्दिश्य ममेदं गतवांश्च सः ||१०||` | "Said 'It exists,' pointing to my womb, and then he departed. ||10||" |
| `Line 5484: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5485: स्वैरेष्वपि न तेनाहं स्मरामि वितथं क्वचित् |` | "Even in personal matters, I do not remember him ever speaking falsely," |
| `Line 5486: उक्तपूर्वं कुतो राजन्साम्पराये स वक्ष्यति ||११||` | "How then, O king [of serpents], would he speak falsely about the future? ||11||" |
| `Line 5487: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5488: न सन्तापस्त्वया कार्यः कार्यं प्रति भुजङ्गमे |` | "You should not grieve about this matter, O serpent," |
| `Line 5489: उत्पत्स्यति हि ते पुत्रो ज्वलनार्कसमद्युतिः ||१२||` | "For a son will be born to you with radiance equal to fire and the sun. ||12||" |
| `Line 5490: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5491: इत्युक्त्वा हि स मां भ्रातर्गतो भर्ता तपोवनम् |` | "Having said this to me, O brother, my husband departed for the forest of austerities," |
| `Line 5492: तस्माद्व्येतु परं दुःखं तवेदं मनसि स्थितम् ||१३||` | "Therefore, let this extreme sorrow that dwells in your mind depart. ||13||" |
| `Line 5493: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5494: एतच्छ्रुत्वा स नागेन्द्रो वासुकिः परया मुदा |` | "Hearing this, that king of serpents, Vāsuki, with great joy," |
| `Line 5495: एवमस्त्विति तद्वाक्यं भगिन्याः प्रत्यगृह्णत ||१४||` | "Accepted those words of his sister, saying, 'Let it be so.' ||14||" |
| `Line 5496: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5497: सान्त्वमानार्थदानैश्च पूजया चानुरूपया |` | "With consolations, gifts of wealth, and appropriate honors," |
| `Line 5498: सोदर्यां पूजयामास स्वसारं पन्नगोत्तमः ||१५||` | "That best of serpents honored his own sister. ||15||" |
| `Line 5499: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5500: ततः स ववृधे गर्भो महातेजा रविप्रभः |` | "Then that embryo grew, full of great splendor, radiant like the sun," |
translations: | `Line 5476: आचक्ष्व भद्रे भर्तुस्त्वं सर्वमेव विचेष्टितम् |` | "Tell me, auspicious one, all about your husband's actions," |
| `Line 5477: शल्यमुद्धर मे घोरं भद्रे हृदि चिरस्थितम् ||८||` | "Remove, O blessed one, the terrible arrow [of worry] that has long been lodged in my heart. ||8||" |

| `Line 5497: सान्त्वमानार्थदानैश्च पूजया चानुरूपया |` | "With consolations, gifts of wealth, and appropriate honors," |
| `Line 5498: सोदर्यां पूजयामास स्वसारं पन्नगोत्तमः ||१५||` | "That best of serpents honored his own sister. ||15||" |

|-------------|-------------------------|
| `Line 5576: परिक्षिदभवत्तेन सौभद्रस्यात्मजो बली ||१३||` | "From him was born Parikshit, the mighty son of Subhadra's son [Abhimanyu]. ||13||" |
| `Line 5577: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5578: राजधर्मार्थकुशलो युक्तः सर्वगुणैर्नृपः |` | "The king was skilled in royal duty and wealth, endowed with all virtues," |
| `Line 5579: जितेन्द्रियश्चात्मवांश्च मेधावी वृद्धसेवितः ||१४||` | "With conquered senses, self-controlled, intelligent, and attended by the elders. ||14||" |
| `Line 5580: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5581: षड्वर्गविन्महाबुद्धिर्नीतिधर्मविदुत्तमः |` | "Knower of the six enemies [sensory passions], of great intellect, supreme knower of ethics and righteousness," |
| `Line 5582: प्रजा इमास्तव पिता षष्टिं वर्षाण्यपालयत् ||१५||` | "Your father protected these subjects for sixty years. ||15||" |
| `Line 5583: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5584: ततो दिष्टान्तमापन्नः सर्पेणानतिवर्तितम् ||१५||` | "Then he met his destined end, unavoidable, by a serpent. ||15||" |
| `Line 5585: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5586: ततस्त्वं पुरुषश्रेष्ठ धर्मेण प्रतिपेदिवान् |` | "Then you, O best of men, righteously obtained," |
| `Line 5587: इदं वर्षसहस्राय राज्यं कुरुकुलागतम् ||१६||` | "This kingdom descended from the Kuru lineage, for a thousand years. ||16||" |
| `Line 5588: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5589: बाल एवाभिजातोऽसि सर्वभूतानुपालकः ||१६||` | "Even as a youth, you were born noble, a protector of all beings. ||16||" |
| `Line 5590: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5591: जनमेजय उवाच||` | "Janamejaya said:" |
| `Line 5592: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5593: नास्मिन्कुले जातु बभूव राजा; यो न प्रजानां हितकृत्प्रियश्च |` | "Never in this family was there a king who was not a benefactor and beloved of his subjects," |
| `Line 5594: विशेषतः प्रेक्ष्य पितामहानां; वृत्तं महद्वृत्तपरायणानाम् ||१७||` | "Especially considering the conduct of my ancestors, who were devoted to noble behavior. ||17||" |
| `Line 5595: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5596: कथं निधनमापन्नः पिता मम तथाविधः |` | "How did my father, being of such nature, meet his death?" |
| `Line 5597: आचक्षध्वं यथावन्मे श्रोतुमिच्छामि तत्त्वतः ||१८||` | "Tell me properly, I wish to hear the truth. ||18||" |
| `Line 5598: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5599: सूत उवाच||` | "Suta said:" |
| `Line 5600: ` | [Blank line] |
translations: | `Line 5576: परिक्षिदभवत्तेन सौभद्रस्यात्मजो बली ||१३||` | "From him was born Parikshit, the mighty son of Subhadra's son [Abhimanyu]. ||13||" |
| `Line 5577: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5578: राजधर्मार्थकुशलो युक्तः सर्वगुणैर्नृपः |` | "The king was skilled in royal duty and wealth, endowed with all virtues," |
| `Line 5579: जितेन्द्रियश्चात्मवांश्च मेधावी वृद्धसेवितः ||१४||` | "With conquered senses, self-controlled, intelligent, and attended by the elders. ||14||" |
| `Line 5580: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5581: षड्वर्गविन्महाबुद्धिर्नीतिधर्मविदुत्तमः |` | "Knower of the six enemies [sensory passions], of great intellect, supreme knower of ethics and righteousness," |
| `Line 5582: प्रजा इमास्तव पिता षष्टिं वर्षाण्यपालयत् ||१५||` | "Your father protected these subjects for sixty years. ||15||" |
| `Line 5583: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5584: ततो दिष्टान्तमापन्नः सर्पेणानतिवर्तितम् ||१५||` | "Then he met his destined end, unavoidable, by a serpent. ||15||" |
| `Line 5585: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5586: ततस्त्वं पुरुषश्रेष्ठ धर्मेण प्रतिपेदिवान् |` | "Then you, O best of men, righteously obtained," |
| `Line 5587: इदं वर्षसहस्राय राज्यं कुरुकुलागतम् ||१६||` | "This kingdom descended from the Kuru lineage, for a thousand years. ||16||" |

| `Line 5589: बाल एवाभिजातोऽसि सर्वभूतानुपालकः ||१६||` | "Even as a youth, you were born noble, a protector of all beings. ||16||" |
| `Line 5590: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5591: जनमेजय उवाच||` | "Janamejaya said:" |
| `Line 5592: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5593: नास्मिन्कुले जातु बभूव राजा; यो न प्रजानां हितकृत्प्रियश्च |` | "Never in this family was there a king who was not a benefactor and beloved of his subjects," |
| `Line 5594: विशेषतः प्रेक्ष्य पितामहानां; वृत्तं महद्वृत्तपरायणानाम् ||१७||` | "Especially considering the conduct of my ancestors, who were devoted to noble behavior. ||17||" |
| `Line 5595: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5596: कथं निधनमापन्नः पिता मम तथाविधः |` | "How did my father, being of such nature, meet his death?" |
| `Line 5597: आचक्षध्वं यथावन्मे श्रोतुमिच्छामि तत्त्वतः ||१८||` | "Tell me properly, I wish to hear the truth. ||18||" |

| `Line 5599: सूत उवाच||` | "Suta said:" |

| **Sanskrit** | **English Translation** |
|-------------|-------------------------|
| `Line 5526: ४५` | "45" |
| `Line 5527: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5528: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5529: शौनक उवाच||` | "Śaunaka said:" |
| `Line 5530: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5531: यदपृच्छत्तदा राजा मन्त्रिणो जनमेजयः |` | "What King Janamejaya then asked his ministers," |
| `Line 5532: पितुः स्वर्गगतिं तन्मे विस्तरेण पुनर्वद ||१||` | "About his father's journey to heaven, tell me that again in detail. ||1||" |
| `Line 5533: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5534: सूत उवाच||` | "Sūta [bard-narrator] said:" |
| `Line 5535: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5536: शृणु ब्रह्मन्यथा पृष्टा मन्त्रिणो नृपतेस्तदा |` | "Listen, O Brahmin, how the ministers were questioned by the king then," |
| `Line 5537: आख्यातवन्तस्ते सर्वे निधनं तत्परिक्षितः ||२||` | "And how they all narrated the death of that Parikshit. ||2||" |
| `Line 5538: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5539: जनमेजय उवाच||` | "Janamejaya said:" |
| `Line 5540: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5541: जानन्ति तु भवन्तस्तद्यथावृत्तः पिता मम |` | "You all know how my father conducted himself," |
| `Line 5542: आसीद्यथा च निधनं गतः काले महायशाः ||३||` | "And how that highly renowned one met his death in due time. ||3||" |
| `Line 5543: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5544: श्रुत्वा भवत्सकाशाद्धि पितुर्वृत्तमशेषतः |` | "Having heard from you completely about my father's conduct," |
| `Line 5545: कल्याणं प्रतिपत्स्यामि विपरीतं न जातु चित् ||४||` | "I shall follow the righteous path and never the contrary. ||4||" |
| `Line 5546: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5547: सूत उवाच||` | "Sūta [bard-narrator] said:" |
| `Line 5548: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5549: मन्त्रिणोऽथाब्रुवन्वाक्यं पृष्टास्तेन महात्मना |` | "Then the ministers, when questioned by that great-souled one," |
| `Line 5550: सर्वधर्मविदः प्राज्ञा राजानं जनमेजयम् ||५||` | "Those knowers of all dharma [righteousness], wise ones, spoke to King Janamejaya. ||5||" |
translations: | `Line 5527: ` | [Blank line] |

| `Line 5530: ` | [Blank line] |
| `Line 5531: यदपृच्छत्तदा राजा मन्त्रिणो जनमेजयः |` | "What King Janamejaya then asked his ministers," |
| `Line 5532: पितुः स्वर्गगतिं तन्मे विस्तरेण पुनर्वद ||१||` | "About his father's journey to heaven, tell me that again in detail. ||1||" |

| **Sanskrit** | **English Translation** |
|-------------|-------------------------|
| `Line 5676: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5677: इत्युक्त्वा प्रययौ तत्र पिता यत्रास्य सोऽभवत् |` | "Having said this, he went there where his father was," |
| `Line 5678: दृष्ट्वा च पितरं तस्मै शापं तं प्रत्यवेदयत् ||११||` | "And having seen his father, he informed him about that curse. ||11||" |
| `Line 5679: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5680: स चापि मुनिशार्दूलः प्रेषयामास ते पितुः |` | "And that tiger among sages [eminent sage] sent a message to your father:" |
| `Line 5681: शप्तोऽसि मम पुत्रेण यत्तो भव महीपते ||१२||` | "'You have been cursed by my son, be prepared, O king. ||12||'" |
| `Line 5682: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5683: तक्षकस्त्वां महाराज तेजसा सादयिष्यति ||१२||` | "'Takshaka [serpent king] will destroy you with his power, O great king.' ||12||" |
| `Line 5684: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5685: श्रुत्वा तु तद्वचो घोरं पिता ते जनमेजय |` | "Having heard those terrible words, your father, O Janamejaya," |
| `Line 5686: यत्तोऽभवत्परित्रस्तस्तक्षकात्पन्नगोत्तमात् ||१३||` | "Became vigilant and terrified of Takshaka, the foremost among serpents. ||13||" |
| `Line 5687: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5688: ततस्तस्मिंस्तु दिवसे सप्तमे समुपस्थिते |` | "Then, when the seventh day approached," |
| `Line 5689: राज्ञः समीपं ब्रह्मर्षिः काश्यपो गन्तुमैच्छत ||१४||` | "The brahmin sage Kashyapa wished to go to the king. ||14||" |
| `Line 5690: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5691: तं ददर्शाथ नागेन्द्रः काश्यपं तक्षकस्तदा |` | "Then Takshaka, the lord of serpents [naga king], saw Kashyapa," |
| `Line 5692: तमब्रवीत्पन्नगेन्द्रः काश्यपं त्वरितं व्रजन् ||१५||` | "The lord of serpents spoke to Kashyapa, who was going hurriedly. ||15||" |
| `Line 5693: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5694: क्व भवांस्त्वरितो याति किं च कार्यं चिकीर्षति ||१५||` | "'Where are you going in such haste, and what task do you wish to accomplish?' ||15||" |
| `Line 5695: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5696: काश्यप उवाच||` | "Kashyapa said:" |
| `Line 5697: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5698: यत्र राजा कुरुश्रेष्ठः परिक्षिन्नाम वै द्विज |` | "'Where the best of Kurus [Kuru dynasty], King Parikshit, is, O twice-born [brahmin]," |
| `Line 5699: तक्षकेण भुजङ्गेन धक्ष्यते किल तत्र वै ||१६||` | "'He will indeed be burned by the serpent Takshaka there. ||16||'" |
| `Line 5700: ` | "[Blank line]" |
translations: | `Line 5676: ` | "[Blank line]" |
| `Line 5677: इत्युक्त्वा प्रययौ तत्र पिता यत्रास्य सोऽभवत् |` | "Having said this, he went there where his father was," |
| `Line 5678: दृष्ट्वा च पितरं तस्मै शापं तं प्रत्यवेदयत् ||११||` | "And having seen his father, he informed him about that curse. ||11||" |

| `Line 5686: यत्तोऽभवत्परित्रस्तस्तक्षकात्पन्नगोत्तमात् ||१३||` | "Became vigilant and terrified of Takshaka, the foremost among serpents. ||13||" |

| `Line 5689: राज्ञः समीपं ब्रह्मर्षिः काश्यपो गन्तुमैच्छत ||१४||` | "The brahmin sage Kashyapa wished to go to the king. ||14||" |

| `Line 5691: तं ददर्शाथ नागेन्द्रः काश्यपं तक्षकस्तदा |` | "Then Takshaka, the lord of serpents [naga king], saw Kashyapa," |
| `Line 5692: तमब्रवीत्पन्नगेन्द्रः काश्यपं त्वरितं व्रजन् ||१५||` | "The lord of serpents spoke to Kashyapa, who was going hurriedly. ||15||" |

| `Line 5694: क्व भवांस्त्वरितो याति किं च कार्यं चिकीर्षति ||१५||` | "'Where are you going in such haste, and what task do you wish to accomplish?' ||15||" |

| `Line 5698: यत्र राजा कुरुश्रेष्ठः परिक्षिन्नाम वै द्विज |` | "'Where the best of Kurus [Kuru dynasty], King Parikshit, is, O twice-born [brahmin]," |
| `Line 5699: तक्षकेण भुजङ्गेन धक्ष्यते किल तत्र वै ||१६||` | "'He will indeed be burned by the serpent Takshaka there. ||16||'" |
